trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There was one other sighting in Chicago on or around August 8th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsFour or five Bright, teardrop or comet shapes moved in and out and around a cloud high in the eastern sky at at approximately 3:00a.m.on August 14th, 2008. When they stopped in mid-air, they hung there. I witnessed the scene at a tall window at home with my daughter, whom I awakened from a deep sleep. She witnessed the objects from the same window. I was looking for planes and stars. There were no planes. The stars were faint. I saw these objects darting around a cloud and coming to a complete halt in mid-air. Some hung like long cigars. Some were like boxes. I thought the objects were ufo objects. They were silent. I thought the scene was fascinating. My daughter thought it was beautiful. I thought it was odd that the objects stayed within the window's width, although they seemed at least twenty miles out and about a thousand miles up. We got too tired to watch anymore and went to bed.
Summary: Objects moved quiclky in the eastern sky on August 8th, 2008
